name: ZombieTac
description:
This app is developed by me, Rishav Kumar. I am a 13 year Old Boy. I have created this app so that people can spend their gala time challenging friends to our very old traditional game of Tic Tac Toe combined with the modern Zombies! Please Rate and comment your feelings about this app on the app store.
For any issues, head to the support page and report to me.

Thanks for downloading!
